instructions.p0: Emotion recognition systems claim to read your emotions from your expressions. But the relationship between our faces and our feelings is complicated. Our outsides and insides don’t always match.
instructions.p1: Note: emotion recognition systems are a form of facial recognition technology, which has been shown to be most accurate for white men and less accurate for everyone else. This bias may affect your game. In the real world, ER systems aren’t just games. They can have serious consequences.

intro.p0: Move your face to fake emotions.
intro.p1: Can you make the emotion recognition system read you as happy, sad and angry?

prizePage.title: Congratulations! You have a great fake smile!
prizePage.p: You made the emotion recognition system register you as feeling happy just by moving your face. You beat the machine!
